title: Hallmarking
creator_credit: Andrew Holmes, Jack Holmes, Goldsmith's Company of London and Kenneth Myer Productions
brief_description: Traces the history of hall-marking and the evolution of different marks. Hall-marks represent a guarantee of quality and are based on stringent tests. Shows modern gold and silverware being tested at the London Assay Office. The different stages in the analysis are seen in detail.
creator_credit_for_label: Andrew Holmes, Jack Holmes, Goldsmith’s Company of London and Kenneth Myer Productions
